# tf.keras.metrics.binary_accuracy

``` python
tf.keras.metrics.binary_accuracy(
    y_true,
    y_pred,
    threshold=0.5
)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/keras/metrics.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.11/tensorflow/python/keras/metrics.py).
